full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
### W7701-227497-3

#### Description

This is an announcement for the tender of a 4-axis simultaneous numerically controlled lathe. The acquisition includes delivery, installation, training, and technical service in compliance with the requirements specified in Annex Requirement.

#### Important Dates

* **Publication Date**: April 3, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: April 25, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: None
* **Expected Contract End Date**: September 14, 2023

#### Contact Information

* **Name**: Sonia Langis
* **Email**: [sonia.langis@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:sonia.langis@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Department**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

#### Terms and Conditions

* **Procurement Category**: GD
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)

#### Attachments
No attachments are available.

#### Notice URL
Please visit [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15887806?extsite=MTU4ODc4MDZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15887806?extsite=MTU4ODc4MDZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) for more information.
